definition: how old are you? (familiar, or to a child)
almost
how much/how many/several/a few
classifier for years (of age)/year/year (of crop harvests)

sentences.english: I am a divorced and have a teenaged daughter.
sentences.chinese: 我離異，有一個十幾歲的女兒。

sentences.english: How old were you when you started learning singing?
sentences.chinese: 你開始學習唱歌時幾歲了？

sentences.english: Perfect husbands switch careers in their mid-50’s.
sentences.chinese: 完美的丈夫在50幾歲換工作。

sentences.english: But the primary goal of the teen years is to achieve independence.
sentences.chinese: 不過，十幾歲這個年齡的首要目標就是要爭取獨立。

sentences.english: Assange fathered him in his teens with his then-girlfriend.
sentences.chinese: 阿桑格與他當時的女友在十幾歲時就當上了爹媽。

sentences.english: What's the worst thing that can happen for a teenage girl?
sentences.chinese: 一個十幾歲的女孩身上能發生最壞的事情是什麼呢？

sentences.english: Teenagers like to hot-rod down our street.
sentences.chinese: 十幾歲的年輕人喜歡在我們的街道上開飛車。

sentences.english: As the hot days, a group of bigger friends were swimming.
sentences.chinese: 由於天很熱，有一羣比我們大幾歲的哥哥在游泳。

sentences.english: Say nothing of, how old are who didn't break-up.
sentences.chinese: 說真的沒有什麼的，都幾歲了誰沒分手過。

sentences.english: Many children outgrow absence seizures in their teen years.
sentences.chinese: 許多兒童患者在十幾歲時可自愈。

sentences.english: Could you find a teenager to mow the lawn?
sentences.chinese: 能不能找個十幾歲的少年來幫你除草？

sentences.english: When is a child old enough to stay home alone?
sentences.chinese: 小孩要幾歲纔夠大到可以獨自在家？

sentences.english: How old are most suitable for hydrocele surgery?
sentences.chinese: 鞘膜積液幾歲動手術最適合？

sentences.english: It’s aimed at teens, they say, and the creator is here.
sentences.chinese: 他的創造者說，他們的目標人羣是十幾歲的孩子們。

sentences.english: When I was a few years older, I experienced another kind of magic.
sentences.chinese: 當我大幾歲以後，我經歷了另一種神奇。

sentences.english: Two teens were injured playing chicken in their cars.
sentences.chinese: 兩個十幾歲的少年在比賽飛車時受了傷。

definition: age/CL:把[ba3],個|个[ge4]
classifier for years (of age)/year/year (of crop harvests)
age (number of years old)
(a person's) age/CL:把[ba3],個|个[ge4]
age/length of experience, membership etc
of the same age
not bad/tolerable/fortunately
to court/to go steady/to be dating
to get out of a predicament/to stick out/to take the initiative/remaining odd fraction after a division/a little more than
(romantic) love/CL:個|个[ge4],場|场[chang3]/in love/to have an affair
first love
to grow up
at the minimum/at the very least
don't tell me .../could it be that...?
easy to deal with/not a problem/(polite answer) you flatter me
(posing a question: whether sb, something) can or cannot?/is able to or not
